content: Room based on the template <1>«{{title}}»</1> created.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when a room based on a template is created. It mentions the template's title and is likely displayed in a toast notification or dialog box after successful creation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation maintains the XML tags (<1>«{{title}}»</1>) identical to the English, which may not be necessary or idiomatic in Arabic. Consider removing or adapting them to better fit Arabic syntax and user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review the necessity of retaining the XML tags. If they are purely for technical purposes, consider removing them. If they are meant to be displayed to the user, evaluate how they would be best presented in Arabic, possibly using different formatting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'şablonuna' implies 'according to the template', which isn't the best way to convey 'based on the template'. A more accurate translation would use a word indicating creation *from* the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otaq <1>«{{title}}»</1> şablon ilə yaradılmışdır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The tags `<1>` and `</1>` are preserved in the translation. While this isn't technically an error, it might be best to ensure consistent handling of tags across all translations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider whether the tags should be adapted to match the target language's formatting conventions or removed entirely if they're not relevant in the Azerbaijani context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Room based on the template" is better translated as something that indicates the template was used *to create* the room, not just that the room exists *alongside* the template. "Създадена е стая по шаблона" implies the template is a general reference, not the direct basis for creation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Създадена е стая, използвайки шаблона <1>«{{title}}»</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The angle brackets (<1> and </1>) and the curly brackets ({{}}) are correctly maintained in both languages, which is good for consistency with potential dynamic content.
The phrase "vytvořené šablony" translates more accurately to 'created template' rather than 'created from a template'. The original implies creation based on the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Místnost na základě šablony <1>«{{title}}»</1> vytvořené.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure feels slightly awkward in Czech. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vytvořena místnost na základě šablony <1>«{{title}}»</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Raum basierend auf der Vorlage <1>«{{title}}»</1> erstellt' is overly literal and sounds unnatural in German. A more natural phrasing would be 'Raum wurde auf Basis der Vorlage <1>«{{title}}»</1> erstellt' or 'Raum, erstellt auf Basis der Vorlage <1>«{{title}}»</1>'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Raum wurde auf Basis der Vorlage <1>«{{title}}»</1> erstellt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Room based on the template' is better translated as 'Δωμάτιο βασισμένο στο πρότυπο' instead of 'Δωμάτιο που βασίζεται στο πρότυπο'. The former is more direct and natural in Greek.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Δημιουργήθηκε δωμάτιο βασισμένο στο πρότυπο <1>«{{title}}»</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Room created based on template" is not the most natural Finnish phrasing. A more common and fluent translation would be something like "Huone luotu mallin pohjalta".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Huone luotu mallin pohjalta <1>«{{title}}»</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Salle à partir de modèle" is not the most natural translation of "Room based on the template". A better translation would be "Salle créée à partir du modèle" or "Salle basée sur le modèle".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Salle créée à partir du modèle

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The original English content includes angle brackets and double quotes. These should be replicated in the French translation to ensure consistency and proper rendering in the system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Salle à partir de modèle <1>«{{title}}»</1> créé.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Կաղապարների հիմնված սենյակը" literally translates to 'Room based on templates'. The English specifies 'Room based on the template'. While not entirely incorrect, it's slightly broader and could imply multiple templates were used.  A more accurate translation might be 'Սենյակը, որը հիմնված է կաղապարի վրա'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Սենյակը, որը հիմնված է կաղապարի վրա

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>` and `</1>` tags are not translated or adapted in any way. It's important to ensure that these tags are handled consistently across all translations, potentially requiring a localized equivalent or a note to the developers about their purpose.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Maintain the original tags `<1>` and `</1>` as they appear in the English.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "based on the template" is better translated as "basata sul modello" or "derivata dal modello". The current translation "basandosi sul modello" implies an ongoing action, which doesn't quite match the English meaning.  It also sounds a bit awkward in Italian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Stanza creata basata sul modello <1>«{{title}}»</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation retains the HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` which are unnecessary and potentially confusing for the user. These tags are present in the English content but should ideally be removed or handled differently in the translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the HTML tags `<1>` and `</1>` from the Japanese translation. For example: 「テンプレート«{{title}}»に基づいてルームが作成されました。」

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation maintains the XML tags from the English source, which is generally undesirable. These tags shouldn't appear in the final user-facing text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the surrounding XML tags <1>«{{title}}»</1> from the Korean translation. The title variable should be handled by the application, not explicitly included in the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "created" is best translated as a more active verb in Lao. "ຖືກສ້າງແລ້ວ" (was created) implies a passive action. A more direct translation, emphasizing creation, might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຫ້ອງຕາມແມ່ແບບ <1>«{{title}}»</1> ສ້າງແລ້ວ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The angle brackets in the English and Latvian content do not match. The English uses '<1>', while the Latvian uses '<1>'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistency in angle bracket usage.  It should be '<1>' in the Latvian translation to match the English source.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation uses 'template' which is an anglicism. A more natural Portuguese word would be 'modelo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sala baseada no modelo <1>«{{title}}»</1> criado.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Sala baseada no modelo' is a literal translation of 'Room based on the template'. A more natural and accurate translation would be 'Sala criada a partir do modelo' or 'Sala criada com base no modelo'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sala criada a partir do modelo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Sala a fost creată cu ajutorul șablonului <1>«{{title}}»</1>." doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Room based on the template... created." The Romanian implies the room was created *with the help of* the template, whereas the English suggests the template was the *basis* for the room's creation.  A more accurate translation would highlight that the room was *derived* from the template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sala a fost creată pe baza șablonului <1>«{{title}}»</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The formatting with `<1>` and `</1>` is correctly preserved, indicating the translation team adhered to the required tags.

The word 'අන්තරායය' (antharayaaya) means 'danger' or 'hazard'. This is not an accurate translation of 'template'. The correct translation should reflect the concept of a template, such as 'ආකාරය' (aakaaraya) - 'form', 'නමූනා' (namunaa) - 'sample' or 'ලිපි' (lipi) - 'model/draft'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'අන්තරායය' with 'ආකාරය', 'නමූනා' or 'ලිපි' depending on the most appropriate meaning in context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The `<1>` and `</1>` tags are not correctly rendered or understood in the Sinhala translation. They need to be maintained or adapted to be consistent with how they are handled in the source language system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that the Sinhala system correctly handles the `<1>` and `</1>` tags. If not, consider alternative formatting or placeholders.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'bola vytvorená' (was created) implies a passive voice. While not strictly incorrect, the active voice 'bola vytvorená' sounds less natural and slightly clunky. The English original uses a simple active voice construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Miestnosť podľa šablóny <1>«{{title}}»</1> vytvorili.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Room based on the template" is not accurately reflected in the Slovenian translation. "Ustvarjena soba na podlagi predloge" literally translates to 'A room created based on a template,' which implies the room itself created the template, not the other way around. A more accurate translation would convey that the room was *created using* a template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Soba, ustvarjena po predlogi <1>«{{title}}»</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The HTML tags <1> and </1> are present in both the source and translation. This needs to be verified that this is the intended format. It might be better to have the title inserted directly into the sentence without the unnecessary tags.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: If these tags are necessary, confirm they are correctly handled by the system rendering this translation. Alternatively, consider removing them if possible.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Соба креирана на основу шаблона" is not the best translation for "Room based on the template." A more natural phrasing would be "Соба креирана на основу шаблона" or "Направљена соба на основу шаблона". The current translation sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Соба креирана на основу шаблона

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Cyrillic word "Соба" should be spelled "Соба".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Соба

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kreirana' (created) is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural in this context. 'Napravljena' (made) would flow better and be more commonly used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Soba napravljena na osnovu šablona <1>«{{title}}»</1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The spacing around the angle brackets and quotation marks could be improved for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Soba napravljena na osnovu šablona <1> «{{title}}» </1>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'based on the template' is better translated as 'şablonundan' rather than 'şablonuna göre'. 'Şablonuna göre' implies 'according to the template', which suggests the room was created following instructions from the template, not being based on its design.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Oda, <1>«{{title}}»</1> şablonundan oluşturuldu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã tạo phòng dựa trên mẫu <1>«{{title}}»</1>.' is technically correct but slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'Phòng đã được tạo dựa trên mẫu <1>«{{title}}»</1>.' or 'Đã tạo phòng từ mẫu <1>«{{title}}»</1>.' The use of 'dựa trên' can feel a bit formal in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Phòng đã được tạo dựa trên mẫu <1>«{{title}}»</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Room based on the template" is better translated as "基于模板房间" or "采用模板房间", not just "使用模板". "使用" implies usage rather than creation based on a template.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 基于模板<1>«{{title}}»</1>创建的房间。
